items.question: Is orthodontic treatment only suitable for children?
items.answer: No! Adults and teens also undergo orthodontic treatment today, and innovative technologies make the process comfortable and effective at any age.

items.question: How long does an average treatment take?
items.answer: Most processes range from one to two years, depending on complexity and straightening method.

items.question: Is it possible to have hidden orthodontics?
items.answer: Absolutely. We offer clear aligners and hidden bracket techniques - according to patient needs.

items.question: Is there pain during treatment?
items.answer: Sometimes there is discomfort in the first hours after appliance installation, but it passes quickly.

items.question: How do you maintain the result?
items.answer: After the process ends, you receive a removable appliance and complete guidance for keeping teeth straight long-term.
